task_background: Prepare the remote wildlife research outpost for an upcoming field study by organizing equipment, repairing tools, and ensuring all systems are operational.

tasks.task_description: Place the CB Radio (cb_radio_1) on the bookshelf (bookshelf_1).
Find the heaviest black item on the oak worktable and place it in the wet lab.
Repair the broken microscope (microscope_1) in the wet lab.
Use the toolbox to repair the broken centrifuge (broken_centrifuge_1) in the wet lab.
